HELIOS v0.1.0 is the first production release of the unified autonomous research discovery platform.

## ğŸ“‹ What's Included

### Core Features
- âœ… 7 research domains (quantum, materials, optimization, ML, NAS, synthesis, graph)
- âœ… 64 algorithms (21 baseline + 28 novel + 15 ensemble)
- âœ… 35 benchmarks (5 per domain)
- âœ… Turing validation suite (5 falsification strategies)
- âœ… Meta-learning system with Hall of Failures
- âœ… 7 personality-based research agents
- âœ… ATLAS workflow orchestration
- âœ… Complete CLI interface
- âœ… Full documentation (5,500+ lines)

- âœ… 152 tests (100% passing)

## ğŸš€ Installation

### Quick Install
```bash
pip install helios
```

### With All Domains
```bash
pip install helios[all,dev]
```

### Docker
```bash
docker pull ghcr.io/alaweinoss/helios:v0.1.0
docker run -it ghcr.io/alaweinoss/helios:v0.1.0 helios domain list
```
